td.content: s:patient presents with mild fatigue of 5 days duration together with mild fever, mild cough. patient is a M brewer aged 65 ys. he is a chronic alcoholic he has smoked two pack a day for 3 years o:Height 74 in, Weight 171 lbs, Temperature 98.1 F, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16, HEENT: WNL, Pulm: effortless, all lung fields, enlarged nontender cervical lymph nodes, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs a:Tuberculosis p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Isoniazid - 100 mg tab, and ordered PPD.
